name: Kiss Trust
overview:
Kiss Trust is creator and leader of the Online Childrens Saving Trust Industry.

The ground-breaking online platform allows Kiss Trust to provide an affordable “real time” irrevocable trust document creation portal, with an array of design options and choices to meet the needs of a wide variety of families.

Kiss Trust provides for multiple types of trust uses including for childrens savings trust, college savings, estate planning, divorce, child support, legacy trust, special needs, restricted ordered trusts and memorial trusts.

The expense and complexity of hiring a lawyer is no longer a barrier for families seeking to benefit from the advantages that trusts offer.

Kiss Trust holds the patents covering multiple aspects for online trust creation technology center on childrens savings Trust.

Kiss Trust is a division of Eastern Point Trust Company.

The company was founded and staffed by top talents in law, trusts and technology to make the benefits and protections of trusts accessible and affordable to everyone.

Eastern Point Trust Company is not a law firm. Eastern Point Trust Company is a non-depository trust company with multiple regional offices. Eastern Point Trust Company provides fiduciary and trust administration services to clients in all 50 U.S. states and territories, across North America, the Caribbean, Asia and Europe.

milestones.description: Kiss Trust Becomes Division of Eastern Point Trust Company.
milestones.source_description: Kiss Trust a Division of  EPT
